column5: Wow....I'm still shakin' my head at this one!!!....Glen, don't tell me that ya can't beat our current Catfish tourney entry....if these lads can do it, I'm sure you can!!

I'm not a big fan of noodling/grabbling Steve. They're taking the big breaders from our waters!  Tourney rules state hook and line caught only!  Would like to see a noodlers facial expression when he comes up with a large Snappin' turtle or Cottonmouth latched onto his hand!!!
....you wouldn't even catch me close to that mud pit  ....man does that look dirty and I HATE SNAKES!!!!!

lots a fellas do it here in southern ohio too,  but i agree with dawg on this.  it ticks me off to see all those big ol gals pulled out of the system.  the big ones dont taste as good anyway.  plus i kinda like my fingers the way they are and not snacks for the snapping turtles.  jason
The good news is Noodling is a dying form of fishing because it takes to much beer to get good at it. Just ask "lefty" what happened to this right hands finger.  Art
